mapper.select: SELECT A.eventTitle, A.eventContent, A.startDate, A.endDate, A.registerDate, A.participantLimit, B.cityName, B.districtName, B.streetName, B.detail, B.writer FROM events AS A JOIN (SELECT E.userNo, E.eventNo, E.eventTitle, E.eventContent, E.startDate, E.endDate, E.registerDate, E.participantLimit, EA.cityName, EA.districtName, EA.streetName, EA.detail, M.userName AS writer FROM events E LEFT OUTER JOIN event_address EA ON EA.eventNo = E.eventNo INNER JOIN members M ON E.userNo = M.userNo WHERE E.userNo < #{PageInfo.cursorUserNo} ORDER BY registerDate DESC LIMIT #{PageInfo.size} ) AS B WHERE A.eventNo = B.eventNo
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO participant (eventNo, userNo, applyDate, cancelDate, participateDate ) VALUES ( #{eventNo}, #{userNo}, NOW(), NULL, NOW() )
mapper.update: UPDATE participant SET cancelDate = NOW() WHERE userNo = #{userNo} AND applyDate IS NOT NULL
UPDATE events SET noOfParticipants = noOfParticipants - 1 WHERE eventNo = #{eventNo} AND noOfParticipants < participantLimit
